allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Replace Hugging Face Kokoro TTS with OpenAI TTS API

- Switch from HF Inference API to OpenAI /v1/audio/speech endpoint
- Update voice options to OpenAI voices \(Nova, Echo, Alloy, etc.\)
- Expand speed range from 0.8-1.2 to 0.25-4.0 \(OpenAI supported range\)
- Add voice ID validation with fallback to default voice
- Update environment variable from HF_API_KEY to OPENAI_API_KEY
- Update frontend messages from "Kokoro" to "OpenAI TTS"

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
